goal.ch: 御宅族，Otaku，一般狹義的定義乃指「對日本動漫電玩等相關產品專精的熱情粉絲」，不過在此要特別強調，台灣一般大眾聽到御宅族可能會直接聯想到宅男，這是很大的錯誤，御宅族不僅只有男生，還有另一大半的比例是女性，而女性也有分喜歡BL的腐女或其他。當然更不用講，御宅族也不是宅在家裡不出門的人，御宅族會參加很多活動(無論線上或戶外)，為了動漫的愛，會付出許多自願性的行動，並且創造出許多文化產品(無論是有形或無形的)。 台灣一向受日本文化影響深刻，其中動漫電玩更是日本內容產業輸入台灣的大宗，幾十年來也促成了台灣動漫御宅族社群的形成與發展，影響無數台灣的年輕人(甚至也有資深御宅族已步入中年)，牽動著台灣整個社會文化甚至在各種思想上的發展。因此，認識御宅族是一個了解台灣社會及文化創意的一個重要的課題。 此課程的設計是希望讓同學了解日本動漫相關產業的發展與現況、御宅族所發展出來的各種粉絲文化，以及探討與其相關的社會、歷史、文化、科技與法律等議題的一門跨領域學科。 課程目標： 1. 透過多元的視界，交叉瞭解宅文化的精神 2. 透過了解(各國的)御宅文化，進一步檢視現代社會的文化與歷史變遷 3. 學習實踐御宅族精神，並思考其實踐背後的社會意涵
goal.en: Otaku, Otaku, general narrow definition is “the Japanese animation and other related products, specializes in passionate fans,“ but in this particular emphasis, the general public in Taiwan to hear otaku may be directly associated with otaku, which is Great mistakes, otaku not only boys, there is another half of the proportion of women, and women also have points like BL rot female or other. Of course, not to mention, otaku is not home in the home does not go out of people, otaku will participate in many activities (whether online or outdoor), for animation love, will pay a lot of voluntary action, and create many cultures Product (whether tangible or intangible). Taiwan has always been deeply influenced by the Japanese culture, animation and video game which is the Japanese content industry into the bulk of Taiwan, for decades also contributed to the formation and development of the Taiwan otaku otaku community, affecting many young people in Taiwan (or even senior Royal The family has entered middle age), affecting the whole of Taiwan‘s social culture and even in a variety of ideological development. Therefore, understanding otaku is an important topic for understanding Taiwan‘s social and cultural originality. This course is designed to give students an insight into the development and current status of the Japanese animation industry, the various fan cultures developed by Otozu, and an interdisciplinary study of issues related to social, historical, cultural, scientific and legal issues. . Course objectives: 1. Through a variety of horizons, cross-understanding of the spirit of house culture 2. To further examine the cultural and historical changes of modern society by understanding the culture of Otsuka (country) 3. To study and practice Yuzhai spirit, and think about the social meaning behind its practice

outline.ch:
<<以下課程介紹為去年的範本，僅供參考，新學期將會有所調整。正式的新課綱將於開學第一次上課時提供>>
1.課程介紹
2.宅歷史：日本動漫史I
3.宅歷史：日本動漫史II
4.男性向：御宅族－少年漫畫與美少女
5.男性向：美少女遊戲與偽娘
6.女性向：少女漫畫、淑女漫畫
7.女性向：BL與百合
8.作品賞析：男／女性向作品比較
9.宅經濟：漫畫出版與動畫製作
10.宅經濟：聲優與動畫音樂
11.宅經濟：電玩與輕小說
12.宅勞動：同人誌與Cosplay
13.宅勞動：網路的同人創作(MAD、NICO、字幕組)
14.御宅文化與當代藝術
15.台灣動漫發展與現況
16.作品賞析
17.期末報告I
18.期末報告II
outline.en:
1. Course introduction
2. House History: Japanese Anime History I
3. House History: History of Japanese Anime II
4. Male to: otaku - juvenile comic book and beautiful girl
5. Male to: beautiful girl game and pseudo-mother
6. Women to: girls comics, ladies comics
7. Women to: BL and lilies
8. Works appreciation: male / female to work comparison
9. House economy: cartoon publishing and animation
10. House economy: seiyuu and animation music
11. House economy: video games and light novels
12. House Work: Doujinshi and Cosplay
13. House labor: the creation of the network colleagues (MAD, NICO, subtitles group)
14. Yuzhai Culture and Contemporary Art
15. Development and Current Situation of Taiwan Anime
16. Works appreciation
17. Final Report I
18. Final Report II

textbook.ch: 指定教科書 1.王佩廸主編，《動漫社會學：別說得好像還有救》，奇異果，2015。 2.王佩廸主編，《動漫社會學：本本的誕生》，奇異果，2016。 參考書目 傻呼嚕同盟，《御宅學：影響人類科技、創意、經濟，改變世界的新興文化潮流！》，平裝本出版社 ，2013。  Gravett, Paul. 連惠幸等譯，《日本漫畫60年》，台北：西遊記，2006。  岡田斗司夫著，談璞譯，《阿宅，你已經死了！》，時報，2009。  李衣雲，《讀漫畫：讀者、漫畫家和漫畫產業》，群學，2012。
textbook.en: Designated textbook 1. Wang Peidi editor, “animation sociology: Do not speak as if there is to save,“ Kiwi, 2015. Wang Peidi editor, “animation sociology: the birth of books,“ Kiwifruit, 2016. bibliography Stupid alliance, “Yuzuo: impact on human technology, creativity, economy, change the world‘s emerging cultural trends! “, Paperback this publishing house , 2013.  Gravett, Paul. Lian Hui Xing et al., “60 Years of Japanese Cartoon“, Taipei: Journey to the West, 2006.  Okada fighting with the husband, on the Pu translation, “A house, you are dead!“ “, Times, 2009.  Li Yiyun, “Reading Comics: Readers, Cartoonists and Comic Industry“, Group Learning, 2012.

gradMethod.ch: (平時) 課堂表現 (20％) (各週) 阿宅阿腐的主題分享 (20％) ／2~3人一組報告  主題分享內容：說明你所想要分享的御宅族主題(文化、現象、事件、作品、物品)，除了說明該主題吸引御宅 族喜愛的要素之外，還可以涵蓋該主題的歷史發展、產業狀況、社會反應、相關評論等等。要分享自己的看法 ，不可以只抄維基。  報告分為口頭報告和檔案上傳，口頭報告時間為5分鐘，報告前請先將簡報檔案貼到課程網頁。  於學期第三週決定好主題，然後老師再按照主題分配日期。若同一主題過多，老師將看情況請同學配合調整日 期。(期中) 動漫畫觀後／讀後心得與評論 (30％)  繳交3篇期中作業。  同學請於指定週次繳交紙本(恕不接受電子檔，遲交會按週數扣分)，每篇篇幅限A4兩頁以內，盡量列印成雙面 單張。閱讀主題有4次，同學只須完成3篇，繳交3篇以上者則可加分。四個主題分別為： 1. 男性向作品 2. 女性向作品 3. 動漫產業相關作品 4. 宅宅阿腐相關作品 (期末) (a)「主題報告」或(b)｢同人創作」 (30％)  可以是 (a) 御宅學相關主題的延伸討論/分析，也可以是 (b) 同人創作：如同人誌(插圖／漫畫／小說)、Cosplay(製作、組團或攝影)、音樂CD或廣播劇、創作同人遊戲、製作同人影片，或其他可能的形式(請與老師討論)。  學期中決定分組。每組人數以5人為限。  上台報告時間：基本上，(a)為15分鐘；(b)為5~10分鐘。最後還會依照分組數目及各組人數作調整。簡報檔案 一樣請在報告前上傳至課程網頁。  每組須負責將自己組別的上台報告過程錄製成影片上傳至YouTube，並貼連結至課程網頁。  YouTube上的留言、評論也會作為評分的參考依據，因此建議公開並廣徵周遭朋友的意見。
gradMethod.en: (Usually) classroom performance (20％) (Each week) A house Azu theme sharing (20％) / 2 to 3 people a group report  Topic Sharing: Describe the otaku theme (culture, phenomenon, event, work, item) that you want to share, in addition to explaining the theme Family‘s favorite elements, it can also cover the historical development of the subject, industry conditions, social reactions, related comments and so on. To share their views , Not only copy Wiki.  The report is divided into oral report and file upload. The oral report time is 5 minutes. Please attach the presentation file to the course webpage before the report.  Decide on the topic in the third week of the semester, then the teacher assigns the date according to the theme. If the same subject too much, the teacher will see the situation with the students to adjust the day period. (Mid) animation comic concept / post-reading experience and comments (30％)  Payment of 3 mid-term assignments.  Students are required to submit their copies in designated weeks (no electronic documents will be accepted, and the number of points will be deducted by the number of weeks). Each page is limited to two pages or less and printed as double-sided Leaflets. Read the subject 4 times, students only need to complete 3, pay more than 3 can be extra points. The four themes are: 1. Male to work 2. Women to the work 3 animation industry related works 4. House A rot-related works (End) (a) “Theme Report“ or (b) “Creation by Colleagues“ (30％)  It can be (a) an extended discussion / analysis of related subjects, or (b) peer creation: as a person (illustration / cartoon / novel), Cosplay (production, group or photography), music CD or radio drama , Create peer games, create a fellow video, or other possible forms (talk to the teacher).  Decide on grouping during the semester. The maximum number of participants per group is 5.  Time for reporting: Basically, (a) 15 minutes; (b) 5 to 10 minutes. Finally, according to the number of groups and the number of groups to adjust. Presentation file Please upload to the course page before reporting.  Each group is responsible for recording the progress of the reporting process on their own groups into videos that are uploaded to YouTube and posted to the course pages.  The comments and comments on YouTube will also serve as a basis for rating, so it is recommended that you open and broaden the views of your friends around you.
